title: Why you'll want to join The FoodBodyLove Rally

benefits.title: Hand-selected expert advice.
benefits.problem: No more searching for short-term solutions that just don’t work.
benefits.solution: We’ve gathered together the top thought leaders who’ve changed people’s lives for good: best selling authors, elite coaches, activists, and influential researchers.

benefits.title: Create a personalized strategy for success.
benefits.problem: There’s no one size fits all approach to nurturing the mind, body, and soul.
benefits.solution: You get each speaker’s best strategies in every video session so you can take what works for you and apply it to your life right away.

benefits.title: Learn from wherever you like.
benefits.problem: Workshops, conferences, and retreats are soooo expensive. After travel costs, child or pet care, and lost work time, you end up paying thousands of dollars.
benefits.solution: We know how life-changing this content can be and want you to be able to access it without breaking the bank. That’s why we’re giving you a chance to tune in live for free!

benefits.title: Build community and connect with others.
benefits.problem: You’re not alone in your struggles even though it may feel like you are.
benefits.solution: Join The FoodBodyLove Rally Facebook Group to meet other’s on the same journey. Many of our experts lead their own vibrant communities, so you can find the tribe that resonates with you.

benefits.title: 'A-ha' moments no matter where you’re at in your journey!
benefits.problem: Even if you’ve feel like you’ve tried it all, we bet you haven't.
benefits.solution: No matter how many times you’ve tried to get a strong grasp on your relationship to food and body, you’ll walk away a deeper understanding of what works and what doesn’t. To start, all you’ve gotta do is be open to new ways of thinking.
